name: Engineer Standard Onboarding
description: Core steps for all new engineers

steps.title: Set Up Development Environment
steps.description: Clone the main repository and install required dependencies using npm install

steps.title: Access Code Repository
steps.description: Request GitHub/GitLab access from your team lead and verify you can clone the repo

steps.title: Code Review Training
steps.description: Complete the code review checklist and review 5 pull requests with a senior engineer

steps.title: First Task Assignment
steps.description: Complete your first assigned task and submit it for review
